channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 23:45 Air alert in Vinnytsia region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🔴 23:45 Air alert in Vinnytsia region. Follow further messages. #Vinnytsia_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 22:40 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
